meanings.definition: Inflammation of hair follicles, especially on the face.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with sycosis after examining the red bumps on his face.
meanings.sent2: She applied a soothing cream to treat the sycosis on her cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The sycosis on his face made him look like he had tiny volcanoes erupting.
meanings.sent4: The sycosis spread like wildfire across his face, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The sycosis on her face was as angry and red as a boiling kettle.

meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by pustules and nodules.
meanings.sent1: The dermatologist prescribed a lotion to help clear up the sycosis on her skin.
meanings.sent2: He avoided touching the sycosis on his arms to prevent further irritation.
meanings.sent3: The sycosis on her skin looked like tiny alien invaders taking over.
meanings.sent4: The sycosis seemed to form a protective shield over her skin, trapping bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The sycosis on his skin was as bumpy and uneven as a gravel road.
